house_listing.house_description: This townhouse built in 1975 has 2 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 2586 square feet of living area. Features include private pool, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Joan Cohen Realty Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Elevator, Intercom System, Skylights, Walk-In Closet(s)
